text:
Elmarie Louise Wendel (November 23, 1928 – July 21, 2018) was an American actress and singer. She was known for her roles as Mrs. Dubcek on "3rd Rock from the Sun" and as Gina, an assembly line worker at the aviation factory on "The George Lopez Show".
Wendel died on July 21, 2018 at the age of 89.
